title: Calender Crashes after Caldev Import
content:
Hello, our Company uses Horde as a Email and Calender service. We export our Calenders with Caldev and connect it to our Thunderbird application. Sadly since the Thunderbird Update 115.0.1, when loading the calender, Thunderbird Crashes and even with waiting for up to 6 or 7 minutes Thunderbird wont load. We use win10 Enterprise on Version 22H2. What we found was that the Problem only occurs with Staff that has read and wright rights. ThankÂ´s in advance for the help

Best regards Philipp
creator: philipp.bausch

title: Calendar for Thunderbird v115
content:
I can't add calendar of Office 365 to Thunderbird v115 because TBSync (https://addons.thunderbird.net/en-us/thunderbird/addon/tbsync/?src=hp-dl-mostpopular) add-on don't support new version. I think this is core feature and Dev Team can add this feature to Thunderbird.

Thanks so much
creator: bao1296

title: Seeing Double - Multiple occurrences in preview pane
content:
I seeing double ... :-) ... Not on every email, but frequently I click on the email and see 2 occurrences of it that are exactly the same. I attached a picture. I can refresh and it goes away, but I don't believe this is the correct or expected behavior in the first place. Love SuperNova!!

My question is whether others are seeing the same or similar.
creator: dan274

title: Thunderbird is not downloading new inbox emails
content: Thunderbird is not downloading on 2- PC's and think may be new version causing this email locking up and working
creator: twinspindleguru

title: Wrong return email address received by recipient
content:
G'day,

Please someone who is not a piece of granite, as I am, help me solve this problem.

I 'was forced' by circumstances to obtain another email address for my wife, so that I could enter her into competitions, pay her charges, respond to her mail etc.

I entered her new email address into my 'new' Thunderbird email program (my old ISP dumped my account because it could not support me with it's new machines.)

Now whenever I send mail from my own account 'ozgunman@gmail.com' it is received from 'ggungirl33@gmail.com' and a reply is sent to that address as well, - this fault is creating havoc with my life.

Thank You Russ
creator: ozgunman

title: Thunderbird flatpak 115.1 crashes when selecting print
content:
Elementary OS (info in image), Thunderbird 115.1 (info in image), Firefox 116.0.1 (info in image)

Both Firefox and Thunderbird crash when selecting print (info in image).

Current workaround: Open gmail in Chrome and print from Chrome.

All software is the latest versions available within flathub and Elementary AppCentre.
creator: canopus_star
